help_command:
*Price Information* 
/p coin - Checks prices of the coin 

*Market Caps* 
/cap full coin name - pulls the market cap and ranking of the coin 
/cap - shows the total market cap 
/best - shows the top 10 coins by marketcap

*News and Events* 
/ico - shows the live ico
